member.name: T:MistralSDK.Caching.MemoryChatCompletionCache
member.summary: In-memory implementation of the chat completion cache. Uses for storage.

remarks.para: This cache is useful for reducing API calls for identical requests. It is particularly effective for: - Repeated queries with the same parameters - Development and testing scenarios - Low-latency requirements where cache hits are acceptable
Note: Caching is only appropriate when the same input should produce the same output. For creative or varied responses (high temperature), caching may not be desirable.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest
member.summary: Represents a request for chat completion from the Mistral AI API.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.Model
member.summary: Gets or sets the model identifier to use for the completion. Required field that specifies which Mistral model to use.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.Messages
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of messages in the conversation. Required field that contains the conversation history and current prompt.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.Temperature
member.summary: Gets or sets the temperature parameter for controlling randomness in the response. Values range from 0.0 (deterministic) to 2.0 (very random). We recommend between 0.0 and 0.7. Default value is 0.7.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.TopP
member.summary: Gets or sets the top-p parameter for nucleus sampling. Controls diversity by considering only the most likely tokens. Values range from 0.0 to 1.0. Default value is 1.0. We recommend altering this or Temperature but not both.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.MaxTokens
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of tokens to generate in the response. If not specified, the model will generate until it reaches a natural stopping point.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.N
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of completions to return for each request. Input tokens are only billed once. Default is 1. Note: mistral-large-2512 does not support N completions.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.Stop
member.summary: Gets or sets the stop sequences. Stop generation if one of these tokens/strings is detected. Can be a single string or multiple strings.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.FrequencyPenalty
member.summary: Gets or sets the frequency penalty. Penalizes the repetition of words based on their frequency in the generated text. A higher value discourages repeating words that have already appeared frequently. Values range from 0.0 to 2.0. Default is 0.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.PresencePenalty
member.summary: Gets or sets the presence penalty. Determines how much the model penalizes the repetition of words or phrases. A higher value encourages the model to use a wider variety of words. Values range from 0.0 to 2.0. Default is 0.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.ResponseFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the response format. Use to enforce JSON output or a specific JSON schema.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.SafePrompt
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to enable safe prompt mode. When enabled, a safety prompt is injected before all conversations. Default value is false.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.RandomSeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the random seed for reproducible results. When set, the model will generate deterministic results for the same input.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.Stream
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to stream the response. When true, tokens will be sent as server-sent events as they become available. Default value is false.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.PromptMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the prompt mode for the request. Available option: "reasoning" for enhanced reasoning capabilities.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.IsValid
member.summary: Validates the request parameters.
member.returns: True if the request is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.WithStop(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the stop sequence(s) for the request.
member.returns: This request instance for method chaining.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.WithStops(System.String[])
member.summary: Sets multiple stop sequences for the request.
member.returns: This request instance for method chaining.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.AsJson
member.summary: Configures the request to return JSON output.
member.returns: This request instance for method chaining.

member.summary: Configures the request to return JSON output matching a specific schema.
member.returns: This request instance for method chaining.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.MistralClient
member.summary: Client for interacting with the Mistral AI API. Provides methods to send chat completion requests and handle responses.

remarks.para: For production use, it is recommended to use to manage the lifecycle of HttpClient instances. This prevents socket exhaustion issues.
Use the class to configure the client behavior, including timeouts, retries, and caching.
